hero.discover: Discover the Best Korean Auto Repair Shop for You
hero.description:
We are a professional and reliable Korean youth maintenance business located in Frankfurt.
Skilled Korean technicians, masters, and engineers quickly and effectively solve any problem.
We also handle the exterior repairs of leased vehicles cleanly. Don't worry alone anymore!

values.title: High-Quality Values Provided by TK-Auto
list: "We provide accurate and high-quality maintenance services." (Technical Skills: We will provide accurate maintenance based on precise diagnosis)
"We provide transparent labor and parts prices to customers." (Right to Know: We perform conscientious maintenance based on principles for our valued customers)
"Friendly customer service is our basic philosophy." (Customer Satisfaction: We are always equipped with a customer-oriented mindset)
"We provide Korean language support service." (Korean Technicians: We will explain the problems, causes, and solutions accurately)

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We make our customers' lives more convenient and happier based on trust

repair.title: Repair
repair.description: We can diagnose and solve all problems that occur in your vehicle using the latest repair methods and technology.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We provide various maintenance services to keep your vehicle in the best condition at all times.

tuning.title: Tuning
tuning.description: Through our tuning services, you can optimize your vehicle's performance and appearance.

tires.title: Tires
tires.description: We also provide tire replacement and repair services.

carwash.title: Premium Interior/Exterior Car Wash
carwash.description: Interior/exterior steam car wash service 'Partner-linked service' "We make our customer's life cleaner and happier" We make our customers' lives cleaner and happier.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Our prices are fair and transparent. We do not deceive customers with inadequate words or rough estimates.

list.title: TK-Auto Standard Service Items and Price List
list.description: Fixed technician rate of 110 euros, only 10% added to parts and outsourced service costs. After diagnosis/consultation with the customer during estimation, repairs proceed upon agreement. Feel free to inquire anytime.

payment.title: Payment Options
payment.description: We provide various payment options to provide the best service.

repair.question: What types of repairs do you provide?
repair.answer: We can handle all types of car repairs, from scratches and dents to engine problems and transmission repairs.

booking.question: Do I need an appointment for maintenance?
booking.answer: Please make an appointment first for diagnosis. After your visit, we will coordinate the maintenance/repair time.

cost.question: How much does repair cost?
cost.answer: Repair costs vary depending on the type of damage, vehicle model, and manufacturer. We provide transparent pricing policies by disclosing our rates. Inflating parts margins is strictly prohibited by company policy. Please contact us for an estimate.

contact.title: Trust Us
contact.description: We will do our best to keep your vehicle in the best condition.

thanks.title: Thank you!
thanks.message: Your message has been successfully sent. We will contact you soon.
